alert.note: Alert for Eastern Uinta Basin (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued June 12 at 2:45PM MDT until June 13 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 9 PM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, west winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...In Utah, Eastern Uinta Basin. In Colorado, Lower Yampa River Basin and Central Yampa River Basin. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 10 AM to 9 PM MDT Monday. For the Wind Advisory, until 9 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive. People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion due to wind-blown dust.
